summary: Adds an advanced testinghall that allows the player to test a lot of features of the Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Features:
-Exhibition of all weapons, armor parts and daedric artefacts
-get lvl 81 quickly in my skill chamber
-fight against (level generated) enemies of your choice in the battle area
-new Hawkhaven
+test different weather types
+shrines of Akatosh, Arkay, Dibella, Julianos, Kynareth, Mara, Stendarr, Talos and Zenithar
+fight against dragons of your choice (very buggy, don\'t expect too much!!!!)
-room with all spell books
-big crafting room
-room with all shouts
-room for custom character generation
(note: some doors are unused, actually they are just filling holes)

You can visit the testinghall by using the \"coc testinghall\" console command like in Oblivion. It makes sure you are not entering the room during a no-cheat-game.

Simply use fast travel to leave the area (if this does not work use \"coc Riverwood\" instead).
author: TheN8mare
